LanguageData.ZP_Misosiru.label: Miso soup
LanguageData.ZP_Misosiru.description: A standard of Japanese cuisine. In Japan, Miso soup is made using miso paste and a stock called "dashi." Other ingredients are then added in based on personal preference. Colonists may find it beneficial to consume Miso soup on a daily basis.\nDashi is made by mixing edible kelp and skipjack tuna shavings together in near-boiling water and then straining the mixture.
LanguageData.ZP_SoyMilkShake.label: Soy milk shake
LanguageData.ZP_SoyMilkShake.description: A simple beverage that nearly anyone can make, as it merely requires mixing soy milk and fruits together. By drinking a shake a day, colonists can expect to see some health benefits.
